name: Scooters
description: This is a pre-alpha build of the Scooters mod, and is not representative of the quality of the final product. NOTE: vertical movement has not yet been implemented. Avoid elevation changes as otherwise you'll be floating in mid air. HOWTO: To spawn a scooter, run `/summon scooters:scooter`. NOTE: cornering at high speeds will be nerfed a little.
